title: Tweezers: A Framework for Security Event Detection via Event Attribution-centric Tweet Embedding
summary: Twitter is recognized as a crucial platform for the dissemination and gathering of Cyber Threat Intelligence (CTI). Its capability to provide real-time, actionable intelligence makes it an indispensable tool for detecting security events, helping security professionals cope with ever-growing threats.
